languages.text: "До-бро по-жа-ло-вать на-мой-пир..." {n}Вспоминая человеческую речь, существо лениво перебирает мясистыми подбородками, переходящими в плечи и грудную клетку, из которой исходит неясное свечение. Диковинное украшение в виде скарабея, испещренного светящимися узорами, болезненно срослось с плотью существа, некогда бывшего человеком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "До-бро по-жа-ло-вать на-мой-пир..." {n}Вспоминая человеческую речь, существо лениво перебирает мясистыми подбородками, переходящими в плечи и грудную клетку, из которой исходит неясное свечение. Диковинное украшения в виде скарабея, испещренного светящимися узорами, болезненно срослось с плотью существа, некогда бывшего человеком.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}
languages.original_text: "До-бро по-жа-ло-вать на-мой-пир..." {n}Вспоминая человеческую речь, существо лениво перебирает мясистыми подбородками, переходящими в плечи и грудную клетку, из которой исходит неясное свечение. Диковинное украшение в виде скарабея, испещренного светящимися узорами, болезненно срослось с плотью существа, некогда бывшего человеком.{/n}

languages.text: 「ワがウタゲへ…ヨウ、コソ…」{n}その生き物は人間らしい喋り方を思い出そうとするようにのろのろと顎を動かす。顎肉は肩に溶け込み、あばらがかすかに光っている。スカラベの形をした光り輝く模様に覆われている奇妙なアクセサリーが、生き物の肉に痛々しくも埋め込まれている。この生き物は疑いようもなく、かつては人間だったのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ワがウタゲへ…ヨウ、コソ…」{n}その生き物は人間らしい喋り方を思い出そうとするようにのろのろと顎を動かす。顎肉は肩に溶け込み、あばらがかすかに光っている。スカラベの形をした光り輝く模様に覆われている奇妙なアクセサリーが、生き物の肉に痛々しくも埋め込まれている。この生き物は疑いようもなく、かつては人間だったのだろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: «Bien-ve-ni-dos a mi ban-que-te...». {n}La criatura, furiosa, mueve sus numerosas barbillas intentando recordar el habla humana. Sus papadas se funden con sus hombros y con una caja torácica que brilla suavemente. Un peculiar accesorio con forma de escarabajo cubierto de brillantes glifos carmesíes se ha clavado dolorosamente en la carne de una criatura que indudablemente fue humana en algún momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Bien-ve-ni-dos a mi ban-que-te...». {n}La criatura, furiosa, mueve sus numerosas barbillas intentando recordar el habla humana. Sus papadas se funden con sus hombros y con una caja torácica que brilla suavemente. Un peculiar accesorio con forma de escarabajo cubierto de brillantes glifos carmesíes se ha clavado dolorosamente en la carne de una criatura que indudablemente fue humana en algún momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: “欢——迎来到我的盛——宴……”{n}怪物懒洋洋地晃了晃下巴，仿佛在努力回忆着人类的语言。它的下颌与肩膀逐渐融合，露出微光闪烁的肋骨。布满发光图案的圣甲虫形坠饰，深深地嵌在这个曾为人类的怪物身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “欢——迎来到我的盛——宴……”{n}怪物懒洋洋地晃了晃下巴，仿佛在努力回忆着人类的语言。它的下颌与肩膀逐渐融合，露出微光闪烁的肋骨。布满发光图案的圣甲虫形坠饰，深深地嵌在这个曾为人类的怪物身上。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: « Bien-ve-nue à ma fê-te... » {n}La créature secoue mollement son triple menton, tentant à grand-peine de se souvenir du langage humain. Ses bajoues s'enfoncent finalement dans ses épaules et sa cage thoracique dont émane une faible lueur. Un étrange accessoire en forme de scarabée, couvert de motifs lumineux, est douloureusement implanté dans la chair de la créature qui devait être autrefois un homme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien-ve-nue à ma fê-te... » {n}La créature secoue mollement son triple menton, tentant à grand-peine de se souvenir du langage humain. Ses bajoues s'enfoncent finalement dans ses épaules et sa cage thoracique dont émane une faible lueur. Un étrange accessoire en forme de scarabée, couvert de motifs lumineux, est douloureusement implanté dans la chair de la créature qui devait être autrefois un homme.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Will-komm-en zu meinem Fest-mahl ..." {n}Die Kreatur lässt faul ihre Kinne wackeln, in dem Versuch, sich an menschliche Sprache zu erinnern. Ihre Wangen verschmelzen mit ihren Schultern und ihrem sanft leuchtenden Brustkorb. Ein eigenartiges Accessoire hat sich schmerzhaft in das Fleisch der Kreatur gebohrt. Es hat die Form eines Skarabäus und ist mit leuchtenden Mustern bedeckt. Es war zweifellos einmal ein Mensch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Will-komm-en zu meinem Fest-mahl ..." {n}Die Kreatur lässt faul ihre Kinne wackeln, in dem Versuch, sich an menschliche Sprache zu erinnern. Ihre Wangen verschmelzen mit ihren Schultern und ihrem sanft leuchtenden Brustkorb. Ein eigenartiges Accessoire hat sich schmerzhaft in das Fleisch der Kreatur gebohrt. Es hat die Form eines Skarabäus und ist mit leuchtenden Mustern bedeckt. Es war zweifellos einmal ein Mensch.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Şö... Lenime hoş... Geldiniz..." {n}İnsanların nasıl konuştuğunu hatırlamaya çalışan yaratık, çenesini aylak aylak sallıyor. Gıdısı, omuzları ve hafifçe parlayan kaburgasıyla bir olmuş. Parlak desenlerle kaplı bir böcek şeklindeki acayip bir aksesuar, yaratığın bedeninde acı verici bir şekilde sıkışmış. Bu yaratığın bir zamanlar insan olduğu su götürmez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wel-come to my fe-ast..." {n}The creature idly jiggles its chins in an effort to remember human speech, its jowls melding into its shoulders and faintly glowing ribcage. A peculiar accessory shaped like a scarab and covered in luminous patterns has painfully lodged itself into the flesh of the creature, something that undoubtedly used to be a man.{/n}
